name: Manual Trigger
semantic_context: Runs the flow on clicking a button in n8n
natural_language_description: 这是 Manual Trigger 节点。主要用于: Runs the flow on clicking a button in n8n

notice.displayName:
This node is where the workflow execution starts (when you click the ‘test’ button on the canvas).

Explore other ways to trigger your workflow (e.g on a schedule, or a webhook)
